typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Dept_ID as integer,
		Salary as decimal(10,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerSalarysource
source(output(
		Dept_ID as integer,
		Dept_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DepartWindowsource
CustomerSalarysource, DepartWindowsource join(CustomerSalarysource@Dept_ID == DepartWindowsource@Dept_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerWindowJoin
CustomerWindowJoin window(over(DepartName = Dept_Name),
	AvgSalary = avg(Salary)) ~> CustomerAvgSalaryWindow
CustomerAvgSalaryWindow sink(input(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Dept_ID as integer,
		Salary as decimal(10,2),
		AvgSalary as decimal(10,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Cust_ID,
		Customer_Name,
		Dept_ID = DepartWindowsource@Dept_ID,
		Salary,
		AvgSalary
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerSalarySink
